channel.title: PI chaotic crossbow problem (you can't use (BLA) bolts with chaotic cross
channel.description: sup, i added chaotic crossbow and whenever i faking try attacking anything it says this You can't use (bolts) with a chaotic crossbow? please help..

item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

you need to add the itemid for each bolt as ammo/other ammo I don’t remember if there is an other ammo int
